section.p: comes with a mail mock (oscm-maildev container), which can be used for quick start-up and testing purposes until a real mail server is available. The mail mock is configured in the initial settings in the var.env configuration file (see for details).
As long as this configuration is not changed, all mails are collected in the mail mock. They are not forwarded to the specified receivers.
As the operator, you can access the mail mock with all the mails in the following way:

ol.li:
Type the following URL in your Web browser's address bar:
http://<host_fqdn>:8082/
<host_fqdn> is the fully qualified name or IP address of the host used to access , 8082 is the port. Make sure to use http, not https.
If you have activated the proxy, use the following address:
https://<host_fqdn>/mail/
In the login dialog, enter your user ID and password.

section.p: This opens the user interface of the mail mock with all the existing mails. You can view the mails as well as download and delete them.
